product_name: Rossignol Fun Girl Skis with Bindings - Junior Girls' - 2012/2013
long_description: Novice to intermediate little ladies looking to rip it up all over the mountain will find a new best friend in Rossignol Fun Girl skis with bindings. Designed to be stable and forgiving, Rossignol Fun Girl skis with bindings encourage confidence and skill progression; ideal for groomed trails at low to medium speeds. Cap construction keeps skis light and fun. Forgiving microcell-foam core won't punish a developing skier for small mistakes yet is responsive enough to encourage skill progression. Saphir 45 bindings feature lightweight composite materials that ease turn transitions and make carrying skis a breeze. Design makes it easy to step into and exit the bindings. DIN range of 0.75 - 4.5.
short_description: Novice to intermediate little ladies looking to rip it up all over the mountain will find a new best friend in Rossignol Fun Girl skis with bindings.
